model_answer: The answer should include both (B) and (C). The governor's visit to Cape Girardeau was to promote the “100 Missouri Miles Challenge”, which encourages Missourians to get outdoors and stay active. He also mentioned having completed over 300 miles himself, highlighting his personal commitment to the cause. This event set the stage for the rest of the conversation about trails, tax policy, and the movie industry.

B: The Governor details the public health risks of removing propofol from medical protocols, explains halting an execution, seeking a new death warrant, and developing a new chemical method for lethal injection.
